languages.text: {n}Владайм кивает и поднимается с колен.{/n} "Тогда перейдем к делу".

traits.locale_text: {n}Владайм кивает и поднимается с колен.{/n} "Тогда перейдем к делу".
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Vladaym nods and stands up.{/n} "Then let's get down to business."
languages.original_text: {n}Владайм кивает и поднимается с колен.{/n} "Тогда перейдем к делу".

traits.locale_text: {n}Vladaym nods and gets up from his knees.{/n} "Then let's get down to business."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: {n}弗拉迪姆点点头，站起身来。{/n}“那我们就谈正事吧。”
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym nods and stands up.{/n} "Then let's get down to business."

traits.locale_text: {n}弗拉迪姆点点头，站了起来。{/n}“那我们就谈正事吧。”
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: {n}ヴラダイムは頷き、立ち上がる。{/n}「それでは、本題に入ろう」
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym nods and stands up.{/n} "Then let's get down to business."

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴラダイムは頷き、立ち上がる。{/n}「それでは、本題に入ろう」
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Vladaym asiente y se levanta.{/n} «Pongámonos manos a la obra».
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym nods and stands up.{/n} "Then let's get down to business."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vladaym asiente y se levanta.{/n} «Pongámonos manos a la obra».
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Vladaym nickt und erhebt sich.{/n} "Dann kommen wir zur Sache."
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym nods and stands up.{/n} "Then let's get down to business."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vladaym nickt und erhebt sich.{/n} "Dann kommen wir zur Sache."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Vladaym hoche la tête et se relève.{/n} « Dans ce cas, mettons-nous au travail. »
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym nods and stands up.{/n} "Then let's get down to business."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vladaym hoche la tête et se relève.{/n} « Dans ce cas, mettons-nous au travail. »

languages.text: {n}Vladaym, başıyla onaylayıp ayağa kalkıyor.{/n} "O hâlde işimize bakalım."
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym nods and stands up.{/n} "Then let's get down to business."
